resources.string: This application is used for tracking and monitoring natural disater around the world. By using our application, you will get the latest disater news, warning, information,...\n\nClicking overflow menu and choosing approriate disater type you want to see. With offline mode support you can see results without Internet. Sound great?

Natural disater is truly a fear of human. By developing Natual Disater app we want to give you the latest information and warning so that anybody is aware of disaters happening in their country. We are looking forward for your feedback to improve our service in the future. Feel free to ask us.


Thank You


Developing Team
